release.action: Activate cleanup of hadoop temp data older than 5 days per default (see bin/afterCrawl.sh, tested under UNIX only).
Change searcher update logic, make all searcher observing the same nutch instance update on index change (refresh file search.update, instead of create/remove it).
Add more restrictive URL validation. Limit and Exclude URLs are forced to have the same domain as the Start-URL. Regular expressions are validated.
Add new property 'search.instance.folder' to be able to set multiple instance folder for the searcher.
Add deduplicating multi searcher. This searcher removes duplicates by URL. Reduces search performance.
Instances can issue crawls independently, enabling parallel crawls (instance specific hadoop temp directories).
Display partner and provider in every screen in url maintenance.
Add option to prioritize the language definition of the url administration before the nutch find-language mechanism.
Add faceting support.
Add functionality to add scripts that are called before and after a scheduled crawl.
Add functionality to enable the current crawl for search automatically (and disabling others).
Add a crawl-db analyser tool for analysing the crawl db in terms on refetch intervals.
Remove all URLs from crawl that do not fit into the Limit/Exclude URL realm. Changes in URL maintenance will be reflected aver the following crawl.
Allow user with role admin to login with same permissions as admin-portal.
Upgrade PDF parser library to current version, fixing some PDF parsing issues.
Remove metadata "functional category" from "topics" catalog pages.
Updated start-index.sh and start-search.sh, which had an issue when being batch-invoked, deleted RSYNC which is no longer used, see https://dev.wemove.com/jira/browse/INGRID-1885
Optimized SNSIndexingInterface (from SNS iPlug), added DEBUG output of classify result.
Make sure not-modified URLs from merged segments are indexed even with option "merge.after.fetch" is false.
Fixed wrong links when user has logged in with wrong permissions (role).
Add more strict link extraction to avoid false link detection.
Changed partner/provider sync behavior. Partner/provider are synced based on their key now, not their name anymore.

New Ranking algorithm: Avoid clearing out all unfetched urls by the link rank algorithm, otherwise many urls will never be fetched, because they will not be sorted into the fetch list anymore. Now all outlinks get the score from their parent devided by the number of outlinks of the parent.
Implement RegExp detection for limit and exclude urls in url maintenance.
Fix problem with url export and NULL urls.
Fix problem with IE8: could not delete any URL.
Make limit/exclude url filtering case sensitive. Match limit patterns with regular expression when merging metadata.
Link extraction in text files is now more strict to avoid false link extraction.
Fix error with installation. A file was not found.
Add modified URLs to statistics count to reflect all crawled URLs in statistics.
Calculate webgraph only if we have new segments available.
Changes to URL metadata were not reflected in crawl url export after first crawl was running.
Added installer with most configurations for the iPlug.

New version of iPlug-SE. This version uses the project 'nutchgui' (version 'v03') and nutch version 1.0 for crawling. The main difference is the introduction of "adaptive crawling", where crawl cycles won't take so much time anymore'
Using a new scoring algorithm (WebGraph), which replaces the old and instable OPIC scoring. Scores won't increase permanently anymore, since score will be calculated completely new after each crawl.
Administration pages completely rewritten.
